name: telemetry-action
description: GitHub Action to capture CPU and memory usage metrics

scripts.build: ncc build src/main.ts -o dist/main && ncc build src/post.ts -o dist/post && npm run move-dist
scripts.move-dist: mv dist/main/index.js dist/main.js && mv dist/post/index.js dist/post.js && rm -rf dist/main dist/post
